name: WhatsAppCustomizer
author: fidele007
description:
Make your WhatsApp look unique with customization. Confirmed working on WhatsApp Messenger v.2.12.6.

Features included:
  • Bubble color
  • Text color
  • Time stamp color
  • Message status color
  • Date bubble and text colors
  • Chat font size

0.0.1-187: Fixed libcolorpicker bug where color values always reset
1.1: Fixed text color bug in Group Chat
Added more color options for Group Chat
